description:
Korn Ferry has partnered with our client on their search for the role, Director of HR.

Our client is a mission-oriented med device company helping patients live better lives. We are seeking a hands-on HR professional with a broad background. Reports to the CEO. Located in Valencia. This is an on-site role. Will work with a PEO. Base range $140,000 - $160,000 dependent on experience.

**SE# 510666980**
